title: When can I join a friend's club?
body: I am fairly knew and I want to join a friend's club but they say it won't let them send me an invite, is there a level requirement or something I need to do to use clubs?

replies.body: Hmm, I took a look at your account and don't see anything that would prevent you from joining a club.  Is your club leader or officer able to invite others?
He is the leader of the club

Strange!  Is he able to invite anyone else?  Have him reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can figure out what's going on with these invitations.  We'd like to help!
